sentences.english: When he left the game, many casual fans did as well.
sentences.chinese: 當他退役後，很多普通球迷也轉移陣地了。

sentences.english: Ergonomic Design When reading for long periods of time, people naturally shift positions often.
sentences.chinese: 人體工學設計當長時間閱讀，人們自然轉移陣地頻繁。
